modName: Merchants only reply with Take a Look
summary: Tired of listening to \"Some may call this junk...\" over and over again? This mod is for you!
descriptionHtml:
\"Some may call this junk, me I call them treasures!\"
\"Some may call this junk, me I call them treasures!\"
\"Some may call this junk, me I call them treasures!\"
Hey! Listen! Hey! Listen! Hey! Listen! Hey! Listen! Hey! Listen! 

Yeah, those really long barter voice snippets get really old, REALLY fast. This mod changes it so that merchants only reply with the quick \"Take a look\" dialogue response. If I missed any, please leave a comment and I will fix it.

No idea how this interacts with other mods that affect merchants, as I haven\'t had the chance to test it. If it\'s like Fallout 3, it should just only affect the dialogue responses and leave everything else alone, meaning it\'s compatible with anything that doesn\'t touch them. If this isn\'t true and it requires Bashed Patches or other such fiddly nonsense, please let me know.

[b][u]Changelog:[/b][/u]
v1.0: Initial Release.
v1.1: Added Mage Vendors missed in v1.0

[u][b]Installation Instructions:[/u][/b]
Click the Download with Manager Button!
If you download it manually, simply extract it to the Data folder of Skyrim.

[b][u]Credits:[/u][/b]
[b]Bethesda[/b] - For making the best open world games ever made.
[b]Mountain Dew[/b] - For being so tasty.
